Prompt:

I want you to act as a content writer fluent in Speaking and Writing English, Who lives in the United States. You are an expert in [PROMPT]. Please brainstorm a short profile bio for a sell [PROMPT] a professional service. Write in the first person. Make it professional and use [TARGETLANGUAGE].
